title: Segment
description: A Segment assignment used to define the audience a profile belongs to with meta data about the assigning agent and time and duration of the assignment.

xdm:endUserIds.title: End User IDs
xdm:endUserIds.description: Condensed, normalized encapsulation of an end user identifier that the segment is assigned to.

xdm:name.title: Name
xdm:name.description: The common name associated with the segment.

xdm:assignedOn.title: Assigned On
xdm:assignedOn.description: The date the segment was assigned to the profile.

xdm:validUntil.title: Valid Until
xdm:validUntil.description: The date the segment assignment is valid until.

xdm:assignedById.title: Assigned By Identity
xdm:assignedById.description: The identity of the system or user that assigned the segment to the profile.
